channel.title: Resume on Oliver Gutsche
channel.description: Recent content in Resume on Oliver Gutsche

item.description: Resume Link to Resume: (PDF) Research Positions: 09/2019 - Present Senior Scientist Fermi National Accelerator Laboratory (Fermilab) 09/2014 - 08/2019 Scientist Fermi National Accelerator Laboratory (Fermilab) 06/2009 – 09/2014 Application Physicist I Fermi National Accelerator Laboratory (Fermilab) 06/2005 – 05/2009 Research Associate Fermi National Accelerator Laboratory (Fermilab) 09/2001 – 02/2005 Doctoral Candidate Deutsches Elektronen Synchrotron (DESY) Education: 2001-2005 University of Hamburg, Doctor of Natural Sciences, Hamburg, Germany Thesis title Measurement of beauty quark cross sections in photoproduction with the ZEUS experiment at the electron proton collider HERA (thesis) Advisors Prof.
